{{Schematic|caption=
'''Basic AND Gate (A)'''
''2&times;2&times;3 (12 block volume)''<br />''silent, tileable''<br />''circuit delay: 2 ticks''

| style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;

|input|rd-ew|SB+rt-!||||-
|||SB+rd-ns!|rt-w|rd-ew|output|-
|input|rd-ew|SB+rt-!|||
}}

{{Schematic|caption=
'''Adjacent-input AND Gate (B)'''
''3&times;2&times;2 (12 block volume)''<br />''silent''<br />''circuit delay: 2 ticks''

| style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;

|input|rd-ew+SB-u|SB+rt-!|SB+rd-sw!|rt-w|rd-ew|output|-
|input|SB+rd-ew|rt-w!|rd-nw!|||
}} 

{{Schematic|caption=
'''Piston AND Gate with Repeater (C)'''
''2&times;3&times;2 (12 block volume)''<br />''1-tick, flat''<br />''circuit delay: 1 tick{{only|be}}, or 1 tick except when deactivating the top input (instant) {{only|je}}''

| style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;

|input|rd-ew|sp-s|||-
|||MB|||-
|input|rr-e1||rd-ew|output
}} 

{{Schematic|caption=
'''Vertical AND Gate (D)'''
''1&times;4&times;4 (16 block volume)''<br />''silent, 1-wide''<br />''circuit delay: 2 ticks''

| style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;

||rd-$ew||||||-
|input|SB|rt-$w!|rd-$ew!||||-
||||SB|rt-$w|rd-$ew|output|-
|input|rd-$ew|SB|rt-$w!||SB|
}} 

{{Schematic|caption=
'''Vertical AND Gate with Repeater (E)'''
''1&times;5&times;3 (15 block volume)''<br />''silent, 1-wide''<br />''circuit delay: 2 ticks''

| style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;

|input|SB|rt-$w!|rd-$ew!||||-
||||SB|rd-$ew!|||-
|input|SB|rt-$w!|rr-$e1!|SB|rt-$w|output
}} 

{{Schematic|caption=
'''Piston AND Gate (F)'''
''2&times;3&times;3 (18 block volume)''<br />''1-tick''<br />''circuit delay: 1 tick (off) / instant (on)''
The mobile block (un)covers the hole with redstone dust.

| style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;

|||input|||-
|||rd-ns|||-
|||sp-s|||-
|input|rd-ew|rd-ew+lighter+MB-u|rd-ew|output
}}

{{Schematic|caption=
'''Vertical Piston AND Gate (G)'''
''1&times;3&times;3 (9 block volume)''<br />''1-tick, 1-wide''<br />''circuit delay: 2 ticks for the top, 1 tick for the bottom input{{only|be}}, or 1 tick except when activating the top input (2 ticks) {{only|je}}''

| style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;

|input|rd-$ew||||-
||SB|rt-$w!|sp-$d!||-
|input|rd-$ew|rr-$e1|se-$d|rd-$ew|output|-
||SB|SB|MB|SB
}} 

{{Schematic|caption=
'''3-input AND Gate (H)'''
''1&times;3&times;3 (9 block volume)''<br />''silent, 3-input''<br />''circuit delay: 2 tick''

| style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;

|||input+rd-ns|||-
|||SB+rt-!|||-
|input+rd-ew|SB+rt-!|SB+rd-nsw!|rt-w|output+rd-ew|-
|||SB+rt-!|||-
|||input+rd-ns||
}} 

{{Schematic|caption=
'''Subtraction AND Gate (I)'''
''3&times;3&times;2 (18 block volume)''<br />''silent, flat''<br />''circuit delay: 2 ticks''
The bottom input only has a 1-tick delay.

| style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;

|input|rd-ew|SB|rt-w!|||-
||||rd-ns!|||-
|input|rd-ew|rd-ew|rs-e|rd-ew|output
}}

{{Schematic|caption=
'''3-input Subtraction AND gate with Repeater (J)'''
''2&times;5&times;2 (20 block volume)''<br />''silent, flat''<br />''circuit delay: 3 ticks''
The middle input only has a 2-tick delay. The repeaters are sometimes unnecessary.

| style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;


|||output|||-
|SB+rt-!|rs-e|rs-n|rs-w|SB+rt-!|-
||rr-n1|rr-n1|rr-n1||-
||input|input|input|
}}

{{Schematic|caption=
'''Multi-input AND Gate'''
''3&times;2&times;(N+1)''<br />''2-tick''<br />

| style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;

||input+ rr-s1|input+ rr-s1|input+ rr-s1|input+ rr-s1|ellipsis-ew|-
||SB+rt-!|SB+rt-!|SB+rt-!|SB+rt-!|ellipsis-ew|-
|output+rt-e|SB+rd-new!|SB+rd-new!|SB+rd-new!|SB+rd-new!|ellipsis-ew
}}
